review: Great idea. Mediocre execution. I find myself almost not using it at all.There are lots of little quirks (what content will go through, what won't, etc). Device should have option to go off when not streaming. Etc.It's inexpensive and as such it's ok to have it here waiting for the few times I'll use it. But I find it much less useful that I thought I would. Tablet connected by HDMI, or Amazon Firebox, etc, do me more good on a day to day basis.
